mapper.select: select cal_no , cal_title , (substr(start_date,0,10)||'T'||substr(start_date,12,8)) as start_date , (substr(end_date,0,10)||'T'||substr(end_date,12,8)) as end_date , groupid , background_col from calendar c join member m on c.groupid = m.team where c.status = 'Y' and c.groupid = #{groupId} and m.team_status = 'Y'
select * from (select cal_no from calendar order by cal_no desc) where rownum = 1
